_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / That I clepe and call most
_description: A prayer for ‘three boons’ — fifteen 6-line stanzas

BodRawlitg2.First Lines:
ffadur and sone & holi gostþat i clepe & calle most
                    …
BodRawlitg2.Last Lines:
…And alle þo þat cristen beeAmen par
                    charite
BodRawlitg2.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 291-22.

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Fader & son & holygostTo þe I clepe & calle
                    most…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…And graunt me þeose bonus &reAnd all þat
                    cristen be. Amen for charite.
